name: Automatic Product Categories for WooCommerce
author: penthouseplugins

sections.description:
This plugins adds an “Automatic Categories” item to the Products menu in the WordPress admin, which allows the user to set up rules for automatic product category assignment. Rules can be applied automatically to new and/or existing products when created or saved, respectively, or they can be run manually on all existing products from the Products > Automatic Categories screen.

1.0.1

  • Add an additional permissions check to admin functionality

1.0.0

  • Initial release
sections.installation: This plugin can be installed under Plugins > Add New Plugin, either by searching for the plugin title or by downloading the plugin zip file and uploading it via the Upload Plugin feature.

short_description: Automatically assign product categories to new and existing products based on rules you define.
